name: Miniracingonline
description:
MiniRacingOnline is an addictive and very interesting multiplayer racing game with which we will be able to race with players from anywhere in the world.

It is really addictive and has options that we will hardly see in many other games of the same style, even paid ones.

The graphics perfectly fulfill its mission, and we have to think that this is an arcade game with outbreaks of strategy and simulation.

Some of its main features are Internet play for up to 64 players, public matchs, automatic publication of results, track and car editor, rankings, different types of statistics, multiplayer option on the same computer, supports pad, keyboard, joystick and steering wheel, mechanical customization of cars (setups), DRS, KERS, different types of surface (asphalt, dirt, snow) that modify the response of the car, multiple disciplines (F1, Nascar, Rally, Lemans, MotoGP, Touring cars, Trucks...).

More than 350 tracks and 4000 cars available.
